Name: Razzitini
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with lemonade.
Review: This citrus and raspberry Martini is a tad on the sweet side.
History: Discovered in 2003 at Paramount Hotel, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Razzitini contains 244 calories
